class.name: wxNotebook
class.description: This class represents a notebook control, which manages multiple windows with associated tabs.

flag.name: wxNB_TOP
flag.description: Place labels on the top side.

flag.name: wxNB_LEFT
flag.description: Place labels on the left side.

flag.name: wxNB_RIGHT
flag.description: Place labels on the right side.

flag.name: wxNB_BOTTOM
flag.description: Place tabs under instead of above the notebook pages.

flag.name: wxNB_FIXEDWIDTH
flag.description: (Windows only) All tabs will have same width.

flag.name: wxNB_MULTILINE
flag.description: (Windows only) There can be several rows of tabs.

flag.name: wxNB_NOPAGETHEME
flag.description: (Windows only) Display a solid colour on notebook pages, and not a gradient, which can reduce performance.

flag.name: wxNB_FLAT
flag.description: (Windows CE only) Show tabs in a flat style.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED
type.description: The page selection was changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGED event.

type.name: wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING
type.description: The page selection is about to be changed. Processes a wxEVT_COMMAND_NOTEBOOK_PAGE_CHANGING event. This event can be vetoed.

bitmap.label: Bitmap
bitmap.description: Bitmap shown alongside the label (default: none).

int.name: image
int.label: Image index
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item into the image list.

bool.name: selected
bool.label: Selected
bool.description: Is the page selected initially (only one page can be selected; default: 0)?
